Hero.Title: Enterprise GPT for Switzerland
Hero.Description: Access the latest AI models with complete data sovereignty. GPT-4.1, GPT-5, o3, and more—deployed in Swiss data centers, never leaving your jurisdiction.

Features.Title: Enterprise AI Without Compromise
Features.Description: The most advanced language models, with Swiss privacy guarantees.

Models.Title: Latest AI Models
Models.Description: Access GPT-5, GPT-4.1, o3, Claude, Llama, and Mistral. Models deployed on Azure infrastructure in Switzerland North. Immediate access to new releases without data residency concerns.

Privacy.Title: Swiss Data Sovereignty
Privacy.Description: All conversations and documents remain in Swiss data centers. Zero-retention policy: your data is never used for model training. Full compliance with Swiss Federal Data Protection Act and GDPR.

Search.Title: Web-Grounded Responses
Search.Description: Real-time web search integration with Bing, keeping all queries within Swiss infrastructure. Get current information and cited sources for fact-checking. Configurable per user or team.

Enterprise.Title: Enterprise-Grade Platform
Enterprise.Description: Single sign-on with Microsoft Entra ID or your existing identity provider. Admin controls for model access, usage quotas, and content filters. Activity logging and audit trails for compliance.

Legal.Title: Legal Professionals
Legal.Description: Analyze case law, draft contracts, and research precedents with AI assistance. Client confidentiality guaranteed with Swiss hosting. No risk of sensitive information leaving jurisdiction.

Finance.Title: Financial Services
Finance.Description: Regulatory compliance analysis, report generation, and client communications. Meet FINMA requirements with data that never crosses borders. Full audit trails for regulatory review.

Healthcare.Title: Healthcare Providers
Healthcare.Description: Administrative automation and documentation assistance while maintaining patient confidentiality. Compliant with medical privacy regulations. Secure environment for sensitive health data.

Professional.Title: Professional Services
Professional.Description: Consultants, accountants, and advisors handling confidential client information. Competitive advantage through AI without compromising trust. Swiss quality and discretion.

Location.Title: Swiss Data Center Location
Location.Description: Hosted in Azure Switzerland North (Zurich region). All processing, storage, and backups remain within Swiss borders. Network traffic never transits foreign jurisdictions.

Security.Title: Enterprise Security
Security.Description: Encryption at rest and in transit with Swiss-managed keys. Multi-factor authentication enforced. Role-based access controls and session management. SOC 2 Type II certified infrastructure.

Integration.Title: Seamless Integration
Integration.Description: API access for custom integrations with your internal systems. Connect to SharePoint, OneDrive, and Azure services. Webhook support for workflow automation.

Support.Title: Local Support
Support.Description: Geneva-based support team available in French, German, and English. Dedicated account management for enterprise clients. SLA guarantees with Swiss business hours coverage.

Items.Solution: All processing in Swiss data centers
Microsoft Entra ID and SAML support

CTA.Title: Experimente IA con Privacidad Suiza
CTA.Description: Contáctenos para descubrir cómo funciona la IA empresarial con soberanía completa de datos.
